name: obsidian-teleporter
description: An Obsidian plugin that enables seamless file movement between vaults

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.open-vault: open test-vault || xdg-open test-vault || start test-vault
scripts.test:multi: npm run setup-vaults && npm run deploy
scripts.test:full: npm run clean-vaults && npm run setup-vaults && npm run deploy

author: Obsidian Teleporter
